question: Write a letter to your friend about a job opportunity you came across that they might find interesting
text: I am writing this letter to inform you about a job opening that I come across in my company portal and you might find it interesting.

Soft Solutions is a software company which provides cloud technology support across the globe and is looking for a candidate who is having cloud experience to work for one of its prestigious clients. I came across this opportunity when I saw a mail from the HR team stating the available opportunities and eligibility criteria for selection.

The main reason why I suggest this position for you is, along with the global exposure my company is proving many benefits to its employees by proving medical insurance and hybrid work culture benefits. It also provides you with an opportunity to travel abroad frequently to interact with clients, as I know you are very much interested in travel and this is going to be a great opportunity for you to fulfil your dreams.
If you wish to apply, please send me your resume along with the cover letter, so that I can apply for the post immediately.
Looking forward to meeting you and I wish a good luck with this post
